analysis.description:
Reentrancy in UpgradeableToken.upgrade (/unique_chucks/40/0xea42ea8f6ad836d7ceda84d1ddebcbc685c0142c.sol#493-513):
	External calls:
	- upgradeAgent.upgradeFrom(msg.sender,value) (/unique_chucks/40/0xea42ea8f6ad836d7ceda84d1ddebcbc685c0142c.sol#505-506)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalUpgraded (/unique_chucks/40/0xea42ea8f6ad836d7ceda84d1ddebcbc685c0142c.sol#509-512)

LostAndFoundToken.enableLostAndFound (/unique_chucks/40/0xea42ea8f6ad836d7ceda84d1ddebcbc685c0142c.sol#599-610) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_contract.approve(agent,tokens) (/unique_chucks/40/0xea42ea8f6ad836d7ceda84d1ddebcbc685c0142c.sol#609-610)

CrowdsaleToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xea42ea8f6ad836d7ceda84d1ddebcbc685c0142c.sol#686-687)
CrowdsaleToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xea42ea8f6ad836d7ceda84d1ddebcbc685c0142c.sol#687)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/40/0xea42ea8f6ad836d7ceda84d1ddebcbc685c0142c.sol#418-419)
